rules_text:
When this Vehicle enters, take to the streets. [i](Put the top card of your library on the battlefield face down with three defense counters. It's a battle protected by an opponent. When it's defeated, exile it. You may play it as long as it remains exiled.)[/i]
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
